<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.UpdateSetCommitVisible</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Used by Update Set Commit UI Action and Notice business rule</description> <name>UpdateSetCommitVisible</name> <script><![CDATA[var UpdateSetCommitVisible = Class.create(); UpdateSetCommitVisible.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractUpdateUIActionUtil, { initialize: function() { },
_userHasAccess: function(gr) { var delegatedDevAccess = SNC.UpdateSetAccessUtil.checkDelegatedDeveloperAccessToHierarchy(gr.sys_id); return (delegatedDevAccess && (((gr.state == "previewed" || gr.state == "partial") && gr.remote_base_update_set.nil() && !GlidePreviewProblemHandler.hasUnresolvedProblems(gr.sys_id))) && this._isCurrentDomainSafe()); },
type: 'UpdateSetCommitVisible' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-09-28 17:10:48</sys_created_on> <sys_id>1dd97a4b47022200a03a19fbac9a71ab</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>UpdateSetCommitVisible</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="System Update Sets (with remote update set support)" source="com.glide.system_update_set">44f3bce43c31311068bcf327dfe37f6b</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1dd97a4b47022200a03a19fbac9a71ab</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-04-01 22:31:49</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
